headline: Leonardo DRS, Mercury Systems, First Solar, Kimball Electronics, and BWX Shares Plummet, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after investors took some profits off the table as markets awaited signals on future monetary policy from the Federal Reserve's Jackson Hole symposium later in the week.

headline: First Solar (FSLR) Inks Key Supply Agreement With 5N Plus Inc.
summary: First Solar (FSLR) recently saw its stock price surge by 31% over the last quarter. This impressive gain coincides with the announcement of a significant new supply agreement with 5N Plus Inc., highlighting plans to boost the production and delivery of key solar panel materials. Additionally, the company's updated guidance for 2025, which raises expectations for net sales and operating income, likely added confidence to investors. While the broader market showed mixed signals with the Dow...

headline: First Solar (FSLR) 9.7% Brighter on Updated Solar Tax Credits
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Shine Brighter Than Wall Street. First Solar, Inc. (NASDAQ:FSLR) is one of Monday’s top performers. First Solar, Inc. (NASDAQ:FSLR) soared by 9.69 percent on Monday to close at $219.33 apiece as investor sentiment was bolstered by new rules on solar tax credits that went less restrictive than expected. headline: Wall Street Lunch: SPAC King Returns With New Blank-Check Deal
summary: Venture capitalist Chamath Palihapitiya has filed to list a SPAC worth $250 million under the name of American Exceptionalism Acquisition Corp.

headline: Heard on the Street Monday Recap: Talking Points
summary: Market doldrums. Major U.S. stock indexes moved little on Monday, with the Dow industrials and S&P 500 creeping lower and the Nasdaq Composite edging higher. Suiting up. President Trump met with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Monday afternoon.
